visual.name: LinearGaugeByxViz
visual.description: Compare progress of desired value against target value

dataRoles.name: target1
dataRoles.description: Target/Forecast value that would be the benchmark against which we compare the Actual Value

dataRoles.name: minimum1
dataRoles.description: Minimum value to plot on the Axis

dataRoles.name: maximum1
dataRoles.description: Maximum Value to plot on the Axis

dataRoles.name: tear
dataRoles.description: Add Limits to split the gauge into seperate equal bands. Only applicable for Rounded gauge type

dataRoles.name: label
dataRoles.description: Add Dynamic lables for each band. Only applicable for Rounded gauge type

key.description: Unlock additional capabilities with your license key. To purchase a license, visit our website http://xviz.com

actualmarkerHorizontaloffset.description: Move the marker left or right based on this offset. Use it to move the marker just above the band

actualmarkeroffset.description: Move the marker up or down based on this offset. Use it to move the marker just above the band

fontfamily.description: Applied to all the text in the visual

enumeration.value: Lucida Grande, Lucida Sans Unicode, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Bold", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Light", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif

linearGaugeWidth.description: Set the width of the gauge

maximumValueLinear.description: The ending value of the gauge range

minimumValueLinear.description: The starting value of the gauge range

targetmarkerHorizontaloffset.description: Move the marker left or right based on this offset. Use it to move the marker just above the band

targetmarkeroffset.description: Move the marker up or down based on this offset. Use it to move the marker just above the band

targetvalue.description: Enter a fixed target value - if a value for 'Target Value' is assigned in the 'Fields' section, this value is overridden.

gaugeValueBasedOn.description: Choose the value to which conditional formatting rules must be applied

lowerBandThreshold.description: This threshold as a % of value chosen above is the upper limit for the lower band

middleBandColor.description: Color for the band in-between. This band disappears when both % thersholds above are the same

upperBandThreshold.description: This threshold as a % of value chosen above is the lower limit for the upper band

fontColor.description: Select the Font Color of the Axis Title and Labels

filltrackactualvalue.description: Fill the track till actual value using Actual Value color

dlLinearActualPlacement.description: Select the Data label placement for better readability

dlOverlap.description: The overlapping data labels are hidden. Switch on to show overlapping data labels.

dlPlacement.description: Select the Data label placement for better readability

xPositionActual.description: Adjust the horizontal position of the actual value

xPositionTarget.description: Adjust the horizontal position of the target value

yPositionTarget.description: Adjust the vertical position of the target value

yPositionactual.description: Adjust the vertical position of the actual value

dlNoOfDecimal.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for the values
Select the number of decimal places to display for the values

enableDataLabelFormatting.description: Enable to format the Data Labels

negativeValueFormat.description: Select the number format for  Negative values

positiveValueFormat.description: Select the number format for  Positive values

semanticFormatting.description: Colors for underlying Data Format Types
